setAccessKeyId

public void setAccessKeyId(String accessKeyId)
                    throws javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
Sets the resource id containing the access key for this label. This attribute is optional, if it is not specified, the resource id is constructed as <label-id>.access-key. When this resource exists and contains a single character, this character is used as an access key for the label. Otherwise no access key is used.

Throws:
javax.servlet.jsp.JspException
